info.author: DataShop datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu
info.abstract: This component will import a skill, or Knowledge Component (KC), model into DataShop. For more information on DataShop KC models see this help page. It includes specifics for both the input and export formats, as well as guidance on creating new models.
info.inputs:
KC modelA tab-delimited file defining a new skill model. This input is typically generated by exporting an existing skill model from a dataset and modifying it to generate a new model.
The required format for this file is:
Step ID
One or more columns with the header identifying the new model, e.g., KC (New Model Name)
The 'Step ID' values must match the dataset.
The component will attempt to import all models defined in the input file, ignoring those with names that already exist in the dataset.
info.outputs:
Skill model valuesThe modeling results of importing the new skill model, e.g., AIC, BIC.
DataShop KC modelThe model export, which aggregates data across students for each step.
Note: If more than one model is imported, the output files will be zip files containing the model-values and kcm-exports for all of the imported models.
info.options: Dataset id - Parameter that specifies the database id of the DataShop dataset the KC model should imported into.
